text: Angeline is incredibly responsive to our queries and the service provided by the team is exceptional. The fees are reasonable, the devices were picked up for recycling with zero hassle and speed, and corporate paperwork was handled without delay. For enterprise e-waste handling I would highly recommend KGS.

Masroor and Anand came to my office today to collect my disposals. They have been a great help to me. I appreciate their patience and willingness to go extra mile and carry more items. Thank you Anand.
Thank you Masroor
You made my day!

John from the Nautilus!

First of all I would like to thank Vincent and his team for their excellent & professionally job done with our documents disposal. This is the first time we engaged a professional documents disposal and everything was done very efficiently by his team with no complaints even though there was slight issue with the logistics while facilitating the job yet they did it perfectly! Kudos to the team! Keep up the job Job! I will definitely highly recommend them to anyone who is looking for proper documents shredding services!

I want to give a shout out to Sandy Ching, their customer service officer. She is responsive which is very much appreciated given that customer service department is the one facing the customers first. Good job Sandy!

I am truly impressed with KGS - Mr Vincent Soh and his hardworking workers during the collection of our confidential documents for destruction. At the time, my office was commencing on renovation works and despite of the chaos and mess, the workers completed the collection as schedule. Their professionalism and customer services exceed my expectation. I would highly recommend their services to anyone.
